title: BioNTech’s mRNA pivot drives fresh investor optimism
summary: As shares rebound, investors are weighing whether the biotech’s immuno-oncology pipeline could define its next chapter. If you’ve been watching BioNTech, the German biotech widely known for developing the first mRNA-based COVID-19 vaccine (Comirnaty), the recent share price jump might feel like déjà vu: $118 per share, up 22% year-to-date and nearly 25% over the […] The post BioNTech’s mRNA pivot drives fresh investor optimism appeared first on Longevity.Technology.
author: Kyle Umipig
